events.title: Food For All
events.description: Distribution of sanctified and nutritious meal to underprivileged school children from near by villages alongwith teaching and awareness by various activities.

events.title: Yoga Retreat Camp
events.description: Making us bodily, mentally and spiritually healthy.

events.title: Free Education
events.description: Free Computer certified course for Class 9 to 12 students of underprivileged girls of Bihta and near by villages.

events.title: Book Distribution
events.description: Distribution of Prabhupada's books in hostels, vilages and cities.
